TITLE: Episode 42 - #NotSoSafeAtHome
DESCRIPTION: Maddie and Jessie talk with a listener and friend about domestic violence during the quarantine and discuss why maybe shutting down the economy wasn’t the best idea or the safest.  Once again government is “fixing” a problem while also creating four times as many in its place.
